text: Hagi kini ne' Jehosafati'ene vahe'amo'zanema ana vahetmimofo fenoma erinaku'ma e'za eme kazana, ana fri vahetmimofo fenoma, ne'zama, kukenama, zago'amo mareri zantaminena, tusi feno me'nege'za eri vagaregara osu'naze. Ana fenoma eri'nazana tusi'a fenonkino, 3'a zage knafi fenona hantage'naze.
